name: Tradesy, Inc.
description: Operator of an online peer-to-peer marketplace for fashion. The company provides an online marketplace to connect sellers to like-minded buyers and provides packaging materials, shoes and accessories. In addition, it recommends pricing and handles returns.
one_liner: Operator of an online peer-to-peer marketplace for fashion. The company provides an online marketplace to connect sellers to like-minded buyers and provides packaging materials, shoes and accessories. In addition, it recommends pricing and handles returns.
